data.text:
Directors - FAMOUS STUDIOS LIMITED

The company has 4 directors and no reported key management personnel.

The longest serving director currently on board is Arunkumar Jagmohanlal Roongta who was appointed on 14 June, 1976. Arunkumar Jagmohanlal Roongta has been on the board for more than 48 years. The most recently appointed director is Anant Arun Roongta, who was appointed on 01 April, 2024.

Arunkumar Jagmohanlal Roongta has the largest number of other directorships with a seat at a total of 7 companies. In total, the company is connected to 8 other companies through its directors.

NAME DESIGNATION APPOINTMENT DATE ARUNKUMAR JAGMOHANLAL ROONGTA Director 14 June, 1976 Other directorships - RAJASTHAN INVESTORS PRIVATE LIMITED, PUSHPA SONS PVT LTD, GOVIND OIL MILLS PRIVATE LIMITED, PROMPT CHEMICALS AND TRADERS PRIVATE LIMITED, ROONGTA CINE CORPORATION PRIVATE LIMITED, FAMOUS DIGITAL STUDIOS PRIVATE LIMITED, ANANT ARUN ROONGTA Director 01 April, 2024 Other directorships - GOVIND OIL MILLS PRIVATE LIMITED, FAMOUS DIGITAL STUDIOS PRIVATE LIMITED, SARVOTHAM SOMAYYA SHETTY Director 01 September, 2007 Other directorships - LAVENDER GLASSWARE PRIVATE LIMITED, KONARK TRADEPLACE PRIVATE LIMITED, FAMOUS DIGITAL STUDIOS PRIVATE LIMITED, CHANDRALEKHA ARUN ROONGTA Director 23 October, 2019 Other directorships - ROONGTA CINE CORPORATION PRIVATE LIMITED,
